##Problem 1

Load required packages

```{r library, message = FALSE}
#load packages
library(tidyverse)
library(viridis)
```

Import file names to create a dataframe.

```{r import}
file_name = tibble(
  id = list.files("./data/")
)

file_name
```

Read in data for each subject.

```{r}
study_data = file_name %>% 
  mutate(infor = purrr::map(str_c("./data/", id), read_csv)) 

```
